Name: Healing Potion
Description: A simple red potion that restores vitality.

Name: Stamina Draught
Description: A refreshing tonic that revitalizes the body.

Name: Antidote
Description: A small vial of bitter liquid that neutralizes poisons.

Name: Torch Stick
Description: A small stick coated in flammable resin. Burns brightly for a short time.

Abilities.Name: Ignite
Abilities.Effect: Illuminates a dark area for 3 turns.

Name: Throwing Dagger
Description: A balanced blade designed for quick throwing.

Name: Explosive Powder
Description: A small bag of volatile black powder.

Abilities.Name: Detonate
Abilities.Effect: Deal 1d8 fire damage in a 1-space radius.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: A strong stimulant that jolts the senses awake.

Name: Sticky Bomb
Description: A crude explosive that clings to surfaces before detonating.

Abilities.Name: Throw
Abilities.Effect: Stick to a target. Detonates at the start of their next turn for 1d6+3 fire damage.

Name: Flash Powder
Description: A handful of powder that creates a sudden blinding flash.

Abilities.Name: Use
Abilities.Effect: All creatures within 2 spaces must roll their Wis or become Blinded for 1 turn.

Name: Soothing Balm
Description: A cool, herbal paste that numbs pain and speeds healing.

Abilities.Name: Apply
Abilities.Effect: Restore 2 hearts and reduce Wounded condition by 1 turn.

Name: Throwing Net
Description: A lightweight net designed to entangle foes.

Abilities.Name: Throw
Abilities.Effect: Target must roll Dex or become Restrained until they succeed a Str check (6+).

Name: Ration Pack
Description: A simple meal that provides energy for the road.

Abilities.Name: Eat
Abilities.Effect: Restore 1 heart and regain 1 Action Point.

Name: Mystic Ink
Description: A small vial of enchanted ink used to scribe runes.

Abilities.Name: Use
Abilities.Effect: Enhance a scroll or spell, increasing its effect by 1 round.

Name: Minor Mana Potion
Description: A faintly glowing blue liquid that restores magical energy.

Name: Dust of Tracking
Description: A fine powder that glows faintly when near its intended target.

Abilities.Name: Use
Abilities.Effect: Target is easier to track, giving +2 to all tracking attempts.
